content: discover this statement piece that s a nod to vintage style made gorgeous - and effortless - using red heart all in one granny square this pattern features a myriad of shades mingling together to create a cozy crochet sweater with 3 different shades of yarn you get 15 colors to play with as you work on a variety of techniques including double_crochet half_double_crochet in horizontal strand granny stitch and more a range of sizes makes this an attractive gift for anyone on your list red heart® all in one™ granny square™ 8 8 oz/250 g 417 yds/381 m red heart® super saver® 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m contrast d black 0312 gauge motif = 6 15 cm square with larger hook
